branchCategory.name: AD402-A, Auto Drain Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>The AD402-A is the improved version of SMC's proven AD402 auto drain design.  These enhancements include an improved resistance to foreign matter, increased discharge rate and reduced weight.</p>
